description:
Recca finds a kindred spirit in the new history teacher, who knows all about the ninja of the past. The visit to the teacher`s home, however, goes wrong when enemies show up to kidnap Yanagi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kage no ningun Hokage no nazo!!
The Shadow Ninja Clan: The Mystery of the Hokage!!
影の忍軍 火影の謎!!
